Class PersonRemediationReviewAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.engiweb.profilemanager.common.ruleengine.action.reorganize.accesscertifier.PersonRemediationReviewAction

extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to manage 'PersonRemediationReviewAction' entities through Drools rules engine

    • Method Detail

      • findUser

        public static <any> findUser(DAO sql,
                             UserReviewBean userReviewBean,
                             java.lang.Boolean incompatibility,
                             boolean hierarchy,
                             PersonRemediationReviewOption reviewOption,
                             UserBean reviewerUser,
                             AttestationBean attestationBean,
                             Paging paging)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the users to review of the attestation given, assigned to the reviewer provided and according to the filters given. It is possible to filter by user. The reviewStatus filter is an integer parameter used to specify if the search must include the users previously reviewed or not. The allowed values for this filter are: NULL-no filtering,0-PENDING, 1-APPROVED,2-REVOKED,3-REVOKING, 20-COMPLETE. The ownerStatus filter is an integer parameter used to specify how the reviewer is involved in the search. The allowed values for this filter are: 10-only the user reviews redirected to the reviewer, 20-only the user reviews redirected by the reviewer, 30-only the user reviews returned by the reviewer, other values- only the user reviews assigned to the reviewer. The visibilityViolation Boolean parameter is used to specify if the search must be limited to the user reviews with entitlement in visibility violation or not. The allowed values for this filter are: NULL-no filtering, 0-no filtering, 1-only user reviews with entitlement in visibility violation. The hierarchy boolean flag is used to specify if the organization unit filter must be used in a punctual or in a hierarchical way.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        userReviewBean - user filter
        incompatibility - Boolean parameter used to specify if the the search must be limited to the user review that have incompatibilities or not Allowed values: NULL-no filtering, 0-no filtering, 1-only users with incompatibilities
        hierarchy - boolean flag used to specify if the organization unit filter must be used in a punctual or in a hierarchical way
        reviewOption - in this argument can be set: 1. reviewStatus integer parameter used to specify the status of the organization unit review to search Allowed values: NULL-no filtering, 0-PENDING, 1-APPROVED, 2-REVOKED, 3-REVOKING, 20-COMPLETE, 2. ownerStatus integer parameter used to specify how the reviewer is involved in the search. Allowed values: 10-only the user reviews redirected to the reviewer 20-only the user reviews redirected by the reviewer 30-only the user reviews returned by the reviewer other values-only the user reviews assigned to the reviewer
        reviewerUser - user reviewer, mandatory and defined uniquely
        attestationBean - attestation filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        Returns:
        list of organization unit reviews for the given reviewer attestation
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findReview

        public static <any> findReview(DAO sql,
                               PersonRemediationReviewBean personRemediationReviewBean,
                               PersonRemediationReviewOption reviewOption,
                               AttestationBean attestationBean,
                               UserBean reviewerUser,
                               Paging paging)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the user remediations to review assigned to the reviewer provided. It is possible to filter by user remediation review.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        reviewOption - object used to specify review criteria to use in the search. Attestation object parameter MUST be set.
        attestationBean -
        reviewerUser - user reviewer, mandatory and defined uniquely
        Returns:
        list of user remediation to review found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • approve

        public static void approve(DAO sql,
                           java.lang.String note,
                           UserBean reviewerUser,
                           AttestationBean attestationBean,
                           <any> userReviewBeans)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        The method approves the review of the given list of user reviews assigned to the reviewer given of the attestation provided. It is possible to add a note to the approved user reviews.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        note - note of the approval
        reviewerUser - user reviewer, mandatory and defined uniquely
        attestationBean - attestation filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        userReviewBeans - list of user reviews to approve, mandatory and each defined uniquely
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

                           UserBean reviewerUser,
                           <any> personRemediationReviewBeans)
                    throws java.lang.Exception

      • revoke

        public static void revoke(DAO sql,
                          java.lang.String note,
                          UserBean reviewerUser,
                          AttestationBean attestationBean,
                          <any> userReviewBeans)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        The method rejects the reviews of the list of users assigned to the reviewer given. It is possible to add a note to the revoked user reviews. Depending by the configuration of the attestation, the presence of the note could be mandatory or not. The effectiveness of the revocation depends by the configuration of the attestation and is, in any case, subsequent to the sign off operation.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        note - note of revoke, depending by the configuration of the attestation, it could be mandatory or not
        reviewerUser - user reviewer, mandatory and defined uniquely
        attestationBean - attestation filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        userReviewBeans - list of user reviews to revoke, mandatory and each defined uniquely
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • revoke

        public static void revoke(DAO sql,
                          java.lang.String note,
                          UserBean reviewerUser,
                          <any> personRemediationReviewBeans)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        The method rejects the review of the list of user remediations assigned to the reviewer given. It is possible to add a note to the revoked user remediations. Depending by the configuration of the attestation, the presence of the note could be mandatory or not. The effectiveness of the revocation depends by the configuration of the attestation and is, in any case, subsequent to the sign off operation.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        note - note of revoke, depending by the configuration of the attestation, it could be mandatory or not
        reviewerUser - user reviewer, mandatory and defined uniquely
        personRemediationReviewBeans - list of user remediation reviews to revoke, mandatory and each defined uniquely
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • redirect

        public static void redirect(DAO sql,
                            ReviewNoteBean noteBean,
                            AttestationBean attestationBean,
                            <any> personRemediationReviewBeans)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        The method redirects the reviews of the list of user remediations, assigned to the reviewer given, to the new reviewer specified. The original reviewer becomes secondary and is enabled to get the attestation back after if the new reviewer decides to return the review. It is possible to add a note to the redirection.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        noteBean - note of redirect
        attestationBean - attestationBean, mandatory and defined uniquely
        personRemediationReviewBeans - list of user remediation reviews to redirect, mandatory and each defined uniquely
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • redirect

        public static void redirect(DAO sql,
                            ReviewNoteBean noteBean,
                            UserBean reviewerUser,
                            UserBean newReviewerUser,
                            AttestationBean attestationBean,
                            <any> userReviewBeans)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        The method redirects the reviews of the list of users, assigned to the reviewer given, to the new reviewer specified of the attestation provided. The original reviewer becomes secondary and is enabled to get the attestation back after if the new reviewer decides to return the review. It is possible to add a note to the redirection.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        noteBean - note of redirect
        reviewerUser - user reviewer, mandatory and defined uniquely
        newReviewerUser - new user reviewer, mandatory and defined uniquely
        attestationBean - attestation filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        userReviewBeans - list of user reviews to redirect, mandatory and each defined uniquely
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • escalate

        public static void escalate(DAO sql,
                            ReviewNoteBean noteBean,
                            UserBean toSupervisor,
                            UserBean reviewerUser,
                            AttestationBean attestationBean,
                            <any> userReviewBeans)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        The method escalates the list of user reviews associated to the reviewer given of the attestation provided to its supervisor. It is possible to add a note to the escalation.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        noteBean - note of escalation
        toSupervisor - supervisor to which escalate the review
        reviewerUser - user reviewer, mandatory and defined uniquely
        attestationBean - attestation filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        userReviewBeans - list of users to escalate, mandatory and each defined uniquely
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • signOff

        public static void signOff(DAO sql,
                           ReviewNoteBean noteBean,
                           UserBean reviewerUser,
                           AttestationBean attestationBean,
                           UserReviewBean userReviewBean)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        The method provides the signoff of the user reviews associated to the reviewer given of the attestation provided. The signoff operation put an end to the reviewing work on the user. It is possible to add a note to the user review signed off.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        reviewerUser - user reviewer, mandatory and defined uniquely
        userReviewBean - user review to sign off
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

                           <any> personRemediationReviewBeans)

        reviewerUser - user reviewer, mandatory and defined uniquely
        personRemediationReviewBeans - list of user remediation reviews to escalate, mandatory and each defined uniquely

      • findReviewer

        public static <any> findReviewer(DAO sql,
                                 boolean hierarchy,
                                 OrgUnitBean orgUnitBean,
                                 UserBean userBean,
                                 AttestationBean attestationBean,
                                 Paging paging)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the users which are the reviewers of the attestation given. It is possible to filter by user and organization unit. The hierarchy boolean flag is used with the organization unit filter and specify if the it must be used for a punctual or hierarchical search.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        hierarchy - boolean flag used to specify if the organization unit filter must be used for a punctual or hierarchical search
        orgUnitBean - organization unit filter
        userBean - user filter
        attestationBean - attestation filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of reviewers of the given attestation
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
